title: Heibon na Ore ♂ dakedo Isekai de Dekiai saretemasu: Anthology Comic
original_name: 平凡な俺 ♂ だけど異世界で溺愛されてます　アンソロジーコミック
sinopse:
A gorgeous writing team comicalizes popular short stories from "Moonlight Novels" ♪ An anthology of 5 sweet and happy doting stories of ♂ × ♂ where a man has reincarnated in another world.

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)
